tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FieldInformation (
  field_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  field_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  crop_id INT REFERENCES CropInformation(crop_id),
  planting_date DATE,
  harvest_yield DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE planting_dates (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT NOT NULL,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    planting_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES fields(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crop_types(id)
);

CREATE TABLE harvest_yields (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT NOT NULL,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    harvest_date DATE NOT NULL,
    yield_kg FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES fields(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crop_types(id)
);
